title: Marketing rules for targeted messages
description: Create marketing rules based on AI model recommendations and customer data to deliver targeted messages via inbound and outbound channels. The rules should allow me to filter customers based on product-propensities, demographics, behavior, recent usage of services, and transaction history. The rules should also comply with regulatory requirements and prevent spamming customers. The system should provide a user-friendly interface to create, edit, and delete rules.

clarifications.question: List of events to be available in the system.
clarifications.answer: 1. Incomplete product subscribcription form. 2. Visit to a product page. 3. Product purchase. 4. Product cancellation. 5. Product upgrade. 6. Product downgrade.

clarifications.question: Examples of complex conditions to be supported in rules.
clarifications.answer: Timeout between start and end events, event sequence.

clarifications.question: List of spam prevention rules.
clarifications.answer: 1. customer opt-out preferences. 2. Frequency of messages within the limits of marketing regulations.
